tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientMedicalRecords (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  medications VARCHAR(255),
  treatment_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    medications TEXT,
    treatment_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_history (
  patient_id UUID,
  treatment_id UUID,
  treatment TEXT,
  date_started DATE,
  date_ended DATE
);
CREATE TABLE Patient ( patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), date_of_birth DATE, gender CHAR(1), phone_number VARCHAR(15) );
CREATE TABLE Diagnosis ( diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, diagnosis TEXT, diagnosis_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id) );

CREATE TABLE Medication ( medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, medication_name VARCHAR(50), dosage VARCHAR(10), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id) );
CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory ( treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, treatment_details TEXT, treatment_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id) );
